<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Query Objects"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/data-svc/objects"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves objects from a specified table based on search criteria.
Requires authorization and user authentication.


Use helper functions in your respective client library such as condition constructors (`equal`, `contains`, `startsWith`) and field selectors (`field`, `fields`, `id`) for easier access.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"query":{"properties":{"after":{"description":"After is used for cursor-based pagination, which is more\neffective in scalable and distributed environments compared\nto offset-based pagination.","items":{},"type":"array","uniqueItems":false},"count":{"description":"Count true means return the count of the dataset filtered by Filters\nwithout after or limit.","type":"boolean"},"filters":{"description":"Filters are filtering options of a query. It is advised to use\nIt's advised to use helper functions in your respective client library such as filter constructors (`all`, `equal`, `contains`, `startsWith`) and field selectors (`field`, `fields`, `id`) for easier access.","items":{"properties":{"fields":{"items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array","uniqueItems":false},"op":{"type":"string","x-enum-varnames":["OpOr","OpEquals","OpContainsSubstring","OpStartsWith","OpIntersects","OpIsInList"],"title":"datastore.Op"},"subFilters":{"description":"SubFilters is used for operations like OR where multiple filters are combined.","items":"circular(datastore.Filter)","type":"array","uniqueItems":false},"values":{"items":{},"type":"array","uniqueItems":false}},"type":"object","title":"datastore.Filter"},"type":"array","uniqueItems":false},"limit":{"description":"Limit the number of records in the result set.","type":"integer"},"orderBys":{"description":"OrderBys order the result set.","items":{"properties":{"desc":{"description":"Desc indicates whether the sorting should be in descending order.","type":"boolean"},"field":{"description":"The field by which to order the results","type":"string"},"sortingType":{"description":"Defines the type of sorting to apply (numeric, text, date, etc.)","type":"string","x-enum-varnames":["SortingTypeDefault","SortingTypeNumeric","SortingTypeText","SortingTypeDate","SortingTypeRandom"],"title":"datastore.SortingType"}},"type":"object","title":"datastore.OrderBy"},"type":"array","uniqueItems":false}},"type":"object","title":"datastore.Query"},"readers":{"items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array","uniqueItems":false},"table":{"type":"string"}},"type":"object","title":"data_svc.QueryRequest"}}},"description":"Query Request"}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

the object.\n`_self` can be used to refer to the caller user's userId and\n`_org` can be used to refer to the user's currently active organization (if Server Error"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
